LanguageData.RK_ApronSkirt.label: Ratkin apron skirt
LanguageData.RK_SummerDress.label: Ratkin summer dress
LanguageData.RK_SummerDress.description: Summer white dress. The ventilation is good and it cools the body temperature quickly.
LanguageData.RK_StrawHat.label: Ratkin straw hat
LanguageData.RK_StrawHat.description: A straw hat made out of hay. It protects you from hot sunlight.
LanguageData.RK_Muffler.label: Ratkin muffler
LanguageData.RK_Muffler.description: It is a shawl around neck. Prevents body temperature from escaping through neck. It can be used to cross the desert.
LanguageData.RK_Cardigan.label: Ratkin cardigan
LanguageData.RK_Cardigan.description: Cardigan on the outside of the clothes. You can wear your clothes one more time to protect yourself from the cold.
LanguageData.RK_WoolenHat.label: Ratkin woolen hat
LanguageData.RK_WoolenHat.description: A woolen hat. It makes head warm.
LanguageData.RK_CrossBack.label: cross back
LanguageData.RK_CrossBack.description: Simple bag. Can carry a little more luggage.
LanguageData.RK_Backpack.label: Ratkin backpack
LanguageData.RK_Backpack.description: It is a bag to hang on the back. It allows to carry more luggage.
LanguageData.RK_WorkerWear.label: Ratkin worker wear
LanguageData.RK_WorkerWear.description: It is easy to work clothes. Designed to work in everyday life.
LanguageData.RK_Coif.label: Ratkin coif
LanguageData.RK_Coif.description: It is a hat to use when working. Prevents hair from falling over.
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGown.label: Ratkin research gown
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGown.description: It is the gown to wear when research. It does not fly dust and looks intelligent.
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGlasses.label: Ratkin glasses
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGlasses.description: Glasses for Ratkin. This is needed when Ratkin researching at a more high level. It increases the lack of sight for the Ratkin. And feel a little smarter.
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerWear.label: Ratkin explorer wear
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerWear.description: It is the clothes when explore world. It is easy to move and reduces the sound from body.
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerHat.label: Ratkin explorer hat
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerHat.description: An exploring hat. It prevents the sunshine.
LanguageData.RK_ChefSuit.label: Ratkin chef suit
LanguageData.RK_ChefSuit.description: Chef dress. It is designed to be easy to cook to increase cooking speed.
LanguageData.RK_ChefHat.label: Ratkin chef hat
LanguageData.RK_ChefHat.description: Chef hat. Prevents hair from entering the food.
LanguageData.RK_GaurdenUniform.label: Ratkin Guardener uniform
LanguageData.RK_GaurdenUniform.description: It is Guardener's suit. It is important to protect the garden in the Ratkin Society. Only the best Ratkin become Guardener.
LanguageData.RK_WinterRobe.label: Ratkin winter robe
LanguageData.RK_WinterRobe.description: A winter robe. Wear it when work in the poles.
LanguageData.RK_OutdoorBackpack.label: Ratkin outdoor backpack
LanguageData.RK_OutdoorBackpack.description: Backpack bag for outdoor activity. Designed to fit Ratkin body allows to carry more loads.
LanguageData.RK_OrderUniform.label: Ratkin order uniform
LanguageData.RK_OrderUniform.description: A combat uniform. Suitable for Ratkin battles. It gives the wearer a feeling of height so that they can endure a little more pain.
LanguageData.RK_BulletProofHelmet.label: Ratkin military helmet
LanguageData.RK_BulletProofHelmet.description: Ratkin's bulletproof hat. It reduces the fear of the wearer and makes it easier to aim.
LanguageData.RK_FlatColorCoat.label: Ratkin flatcolor coat
LanguageData.RK_FlatColorCoat.description: A sweet, monochrome dress. Seems comfortable and well-appointed.
LanguageData.RK_FrillOnepiece.label: Ratkin frill onepiece
LanguageData.RK_FrillOnepiece.description: A cute one-piece dress with frilly decorations. It is popular with the ladies of the upper class.
LanguageData.RK_HairCorsage.label: Ratkin hair corsage
LanguageData.RK_HairCorsage.description: A flower-shaped cosage. The elegance of Kosage empowers every word.
LanguageData.RK_RibbonHairBand.label: Ratkin ribbon hair band
LanguageData.RK_RibbonHairBand.description: A cute little ribbon. The cuteness of the ribbon makes you want to give one more candy.
LanguageData.RK_SistersDerss.label: Ratkin nun dress
LanguageData.RK_SistersDerss.description: A simple dress worn by nuns. It's a little sidetracked, so it's comfortable to move.
LanguageData.RK_SistersVeil.label: Ratkin veil
LanguageData.RK_SistersVeil.description: A hair veils. It keeps hair neat.
LanguageData.RK_EarCostume.label: Ratkin ear costume
LanguageData.RK_EarCostume.description: It is ear costume to imitate a cute Ratkin. It is not cute at all when used by big people.
